DOC.HEADLINE: NIGHT FLIGHT EXERCISE DRAWS COMPLAINTS
DOC.TEXT: A 90-minute flight exercise Monday night involving a squadron of jets about to be deployed on an aircraft_carrier sparked a number of noise complaints to the El Toro Marine Corps Air_Station , a base spokesman said . " They practiced landing like they will on the ship , " said the officer , who asked not to be identified . " It ' s something that ' s a perishable skill . Landing on an aircraft_carrier is not the easiest thing in the world. " There were no incidents during the exercise , the spokesman said , declining to say where the 12 planes will be deployed .
